original_text: The captain and his soldiers had been watching Jesus. They saw the ground shaking. They saw everything that had happened. They were very frightened and they said, ‘It must be true! This man really was the Son of God.’
korean_text: 백부장과 및 함께 예수를 지키던 자들이 지진과 그 일어난 일들을 보고 심히 두려워하여 이르되 이는 진실로 하나님의 아들이었도다 하더라

sentences.original_text: The captain and his soldiers had been watching Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 대장과 그의 군사들은 예수님을 지켜보고 있었습니다.
